attributes.action: Stop TFL & Train providers going on Strike creating madness, be held responsible
attributes.additional_details: jubilee and district lines on Strike 6th and 14th June. 2 weeks million people late to work
attributes.background: Stop TFL & Train providers going on Strike creating madness, be held responsible. The Trains are currently a mess and have been with with new Timetable mess with hundreds of trains cancelled with thousands late for work daily and TFL always going on Strike this is affecting all businesses as well

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like to see action taken regarding tube and train strikes, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
